user_question: How can I create a vertical garden on my balcony using recycled materials?
final_answer: To create a vertical garden on your balcony using recycled materials, you can use old pallets, plastic bottles, or tin cans. Arrange them vertically, fill them with soil, and plant herbs or small flowers. Ensure proper drainage and sunlight exposure.
